definition[0]: used to mean a person, when you do not know or do not say who the person is
example[0]: What would you do if someone tried to rob you in the street?
example[1]: Will someone please explain what’s going on?
example[2]: Can you ask someone else  (=a different person) to help you? I’m really busy.
example[3]: Have Brooks or someone fax this to New York right away.
example[4]: ‘When are you planning to hire someone?’ ‘As soon as we find someone suitable.’
